channel.title: Pages on Axel Vanherle
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Axel Vanherle

item.title: About me
item.author: axelvanherle@outlook.com (Axel Vanherle)
item.description: Welcome to my blog! First, I want to make it clear that my intention is not to boast or instruct anyone. Rather, I am here to share my passion for writing and to document my experiences for future reflection. Of course, if my content happens to be helpful or engaging for others, that’s an added bonus. As a student of electronics ICT, or computer engineering as it’s more commonly referred to, I am always seeking to learn about the latest advancements in technology and how they can be applied to real-world challenges.

item.title: The Art of My Craft; A Collection of Completed Projects
item.author: axelvanherle@outlook.com (Axel Vanherle)
item.description: This blog! Found here. I used Hugo and GitHub Actions to set up this website, which provided me with valuable insights into the world of web design. You can find out how i did it here P2P-TCP-chatclient-NP Found here. A peer-to-peer chat client in C++ using object-oriented programming principles and QT. The chat client allows users to connect with each other using TCP protocol, communicate through sending and receiving messages, and receive a list of connected peers.
